    <facet>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Chemical change in magnesium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chemische Umwandlung im Magnesium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Changement chimique en magnésium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mudança química no magnésio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cambiamento chimico in magnesio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χημική αλλαγή στο μαγνήσιο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cambio químico en magnesio</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows an example of chemical change that happens when magnesium is heated over a Bunsen flame.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Chemical change</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">irreversible process</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt ein Beispiel der chemischer
Umwandlung, die geschieht, wenn Magnesium über einer Bunsen Flamme 
erhitzt wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre un exemple du changement 
chimique qui se produit quand du magnésium est chauffé au-dessus 
d'une flamme de Bunsen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra um exemplo da mudança 
química que acontece quando o magnésio é aquecido sobre uma flama 
de Bunsen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra un esempio di cambiamento 
chimico che accade quando il magnesio è riscaldato sopra una fiamma 
di Bunsen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει ένα παράδειγμα της 
χημικής αλλαγής που συμβαίνει πότε το μαγνήσιο θερμαίνεται πέρα
από μια φλόγα Bunsen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra un ejemplo del cambio 
químico que sucede cuando el magnesio se calienta sobre una llama de 
Bunsen.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chemische Umwandlung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">irreversibler Prozeß</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Changement chimique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">processus irréversible</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mudança química</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">processo irreversible</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cambiamento chimico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">processo irreversibile</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χημική αλλαγή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αμετάκλητη διαδικασία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cambio químico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
